To all rulers and magistrates to be tender and take heed of persecuting and imprisoning and spoiling the goods of God's people for obeying, serving, and worshipping the Lord God that made them, and the heavens, and the earth, and all things therein / by G. Fox. Fox, George, 1624-1691.
12 p.
Printed by John Brighvrst, London : 1683.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
